abstract: Enzon Pharmaceuticals, a drug company which has been under pressure from shareholders like billionaire Carl C. Icahn for nearly a year, is facing demands from another investor to immediately install two directors to its board and fire Goldman Sachs as its financial advisor.
lead_paragraph: Enzon Pharmaceuticals, a drug company which has been under pressure from shareholders like billionaire Carl C. Icahn for nearly a year, is facing demands from another investor to immediately install two directors to its board and fire Goldman Sachs as its financial advisor.

headline.main: Enzon Takes Fire From Another Activist
